summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Hooker Street from 40th Avenue West to 42nd Avenue West; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with the Resolution No. 16866 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
